title: Julien Desclodure
text:
Professional, academic or examination backgrounds















Sep 2023 - present


Data scientist at DGCL - French General Directorate for Local Authorities.





Sep 2021 - Jun 2023


Ensai - French National School of Statistics and Analysis of Information.





Jun 2021


Statistician attaché at Insee - French National Institute of Statistics and Economic Studies.





Pre-2021


Teacher, master and agrégation in mathematics.





 Latest projects or publications











2025


The road expenditure of local authorities between 2013 and 2023, DGCL. Article and Video.  





2024


Publications of tables on the finances and taxation of local authorities, DGCL.





2023


Analysis of antibiotic use and antibiotic resistance between 2014 and 2021 in Europe - Anses Ploufragan Laboratory.





2022


graffiti-conjoncture: a R shiny dashboard to plot series from Insee. Contribution to the graffiti open source project.





2022


quick-charts: a rmarkdown package to quickly generate charts of cyclical series from Insee. Webpage of the charts.





2022


Literature review on the economic impact of Brexit.






×
